entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
